      • getMaxNotificationNumber

        public static int getMaxNotificationNumber()
        Android platform has a limited number of characteristics to notify at the same time, this is odd because other mobile platform does not have this kind of restriction. Then the user can only notify a set of characteristics depending the android version. The variable that controls this behaviour is BTA_GATTC_NOTIF_REG_MAX variable. Android 4.3: 4 characteristics to notify Android 4.4: 7 characteristics to notify Android 5.0: 15 characteristics to notify Android 4.3 -> Android 4.4 Android 5.0 -> Returns:
        Amount of characteristics allowed for notifications in current device
